SEARCH

Package src2.helper

package src2.helper
Provides utility classes and methods for the Hospital Management System (HMS), including input handling, password encryption and CSV data parsing.
Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    src2
    This is the main entry point for the application.
    src2.controller
    Provides the classes and methods responsible for managing the various operations in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    src2.database
    Provides classes and interfaces for managing database operations within the Hospital Management System.
    src2.model
    Contains the classes representing the core data models used in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    src2.using
    Contains utility classes, enums, and constants used across the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    src2.view
    Contains the classes and interfaces responsible for the user interface layer of the Hospital Management System.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Encryption
    Password encoder using XOR and Base64.
    Helper
    The Helper class provides utility methods for reading user input, parsing CSV-formatted strings, and other helper functions.
